title: Cinematic Action Music Bundle
description: Immerse yourself in a vast collection of 108 meticulously crafted, one-of-a-kind action music tracks that will transport you to thrilling and dynamic worlds.
longDescription:
Introducing the Cinematic Action Music Bundle - Elevate Your Projects with Unparalleled Soundtracks!


Tired of generic music tracks that fail to leave a lasting impression? Prepare for a cinematic revolution with our Cinematic Action Music Bundle, now available at the Unreal Marketplace. Immerse yourself in a world of extraordinary soundscapes that will set your projects apart from the rest.


Discover the essence of originality in our Cinematic Action Music Bundle. Created by the visionary composer Epikton, these tracks embody a level of uniqueness that defies conventions. Each composition carries its own identity, leaving an indelible mark on your audience.


Here's why the Cinematic Action Music Bundle by Epikton is a must-have for creators seeking to elevate their projects:


Unparalleled Originality: Epikton pushes the boundaries of traditional music, fusing cutting-edge electronic elements, dynamic sound design, and intricate melodies. Prepare to be captivated by compositions that break new ground.


Exquisite Artistry: Like a master chef crafting a gourmet dish, Epikton's music delights the senses with its delicate balance of emotion and intensity. Experience captivating melodies, pulsating rhythms, and otherworldly tones that will take your projects to new heights.


Stand Out from the Crowd: In a saturated market, standing out is essential. The Cinematic Action Music Bundle gives you a unique sonic identity that will captivate your audience and leave a lasting impression. Let your creations shine brightly amidst the competition.


Expertise: Epikton's dedication to excellence ensures that every track in this bundle is of studio-level professional quality. The meticulous production, mixing, and mastering guarantee pristine sound that meets the highest industry standards.


Seamless Integration: Our tracks are designed to seamlessly integrate with Unreal Engine, allowing for effortless implementation into your projects.


We're here to support you every step of the way! As the artist behind the music bundle, I personally ensure you receive continuous support through our live chat feature on my official website. Have any questions or concerns? Reach out to me directly, and I'll provide prompt and personalized assistance. Plus, after your purchase, simply send me your YouTube channel link, and I'll swiftly whitelist it for a hassle-free copyright claim experience. Let's make your creative journey with our music bundle extraordinary!


Act swiftly to elevate your creations, captivate your audience, and unlock the full potential of your projects today. The clock is ticking, and the world eagerly awaits your groundbreaking soundscapes.


Listen short previews on Youtube:


Hybrid Mix

Sci-Fi Mix

Ticking-Clock Mix

Action Mix

Horror Mix


This bundle is a collection of several music packs listed below, and each respective music pack contains preview links within their descriptions for you to listen audio previews.


Cinematic Action Drums Pack

Sci-Fi Futuristic Music Pack

Cyberpunk Action Music Pack

Hybrid Action Music Pack Vol.1

Hybrid Action Music Pack Vol.2

Hybrid Action Music Pack Vol.3

Ticking Clock Action Music Pack

Horror Trailer Music Pack



Did you know this bundle is also included in our Ultimate Cinematic Music Bundle which include all of Epikton's tracks for better value?




Dear Valued Customer,


Your opinion matters to us! Help us shape the future of our music bundle by leaving a review after your purchase. Your feedback is crucial in improving our products and services, ensuring we provide you with the best possible experience. Share your thoughts and contribute to the growth of our music bundle today.


Thank you for being a part of our creative community.
technicalDetails:

  • Cinematic Action Drums Pack
  • Sci-Fi Futuristic Music Pack
  • Cyberpunk Action Music Pack
  • Hybrid Action Music Pack Vol.1
  • Hybrid Action Music Pack Vol.2
  • Hybrid Action Music Pack Vol.3
  • Ticking Clock Action Music Pack
  • Horror Trailer Music Pack


Number of Audio Wavs: 108

Number of Audio Cues: 108

Sample rate / bit rate: 44khz / 16bit

Minutes of audio provided: 183

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
